mapper.select: SELECT sa.s_id ,sa.s_student,sa.d_class,sb.m_id,sb.m_number,sb.m_studentnum, sb.c_condition,sb.m_money FROM ( SELECT student.s_id,student.s_student , `data`.d_class FROM student LEFT JOIN `data` ON student.s_id = `data`.s_id )sa LEFT JOIN (SELECT message.m_id,message.s_id,message.m_number,message.m_studentnum,`condition`.c_condition,money.m_money FROM message RIGHT JOIN `condition` ON message.m_id=`condition`.m_id RIGHT JOIN money ON message.m_id=money.m_id )sb ON sa.s_id = sb.s_id
